item.title: ‘Ballad of a Small Player’ Review: Colin Farrell’s Charm Can’t Save Edward Berger’s Hollow Redemption Tale
item.description: Tilda Swinton and Fala Chen also star in the latest feature by the ‘Conclave’ director, about a gambling addict hiding from the authorities and his debtors in the casinos of Macau.

item.title: Colin Farrell Risks It All in Wild Trailer for Edward Berger’s Netflix Movie ‘Ballad of a Small Player’
item.description: Fala Chen and Tilda Swinton also star in the feature that premieres at TIFF and adapts Lawrence Osborne’s 2014 novel.
